name: Lil' Football
description: NOTE: This pattern is KNIT IN THE ROUND, using Magic Loop (or DPNs could be substituted).
sizes_available: Approx. 6 ½” long, depending on type of yarn, needles used, and personal tension.
full_text: NOTE: This pattern is KNIT IN THE ROUND, using Magic Loop (or DPNs could be substituted). This soft little football will delight a special little one. Worked in #4-worsted wt. (Aran/10-ply) yarn, it uses little yarn and works up quick. Knit one up and let the fun begin! This would make a great gift together with Knit Baby Football Shoes found here: http://www.craftsy.com/pattern/knitting/clothing/knit-bab...
